channel.title: Rant and Raves!

item.title: OMGWTFROTLMAOBMPGIFJPEG, I uzed 2 talk like dat?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
I used www.google-fight.com to compare the search results of Trentdaddy versus Trent's Daddy and my name lost by a mile. But I also clicked my name to see the search results and I found mainly forums where I am registered. I also found an old comment on one of Parser's mod from 2 years ago. I wasn't always the smart and wise grammatically correct Trentdaddy you know now.

http://www.planetunreal.com/modsquad/asp/breviews.asp?529

Note how many freaking times I use...

OMGWTFROTLMAOBMPGIFJPEG, I uzed 2 talk like dat?

item.title: U4eT
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neuroflare)
item.dc:creator: Neuroflare
item.content:encoded:
Might as well put a review in here:
Unreal Forever Tournament:

Graphics: 6; Really good modelling and skinning on the weapons and weapon effects, esp. the QSG. Sub-par on the player models.

Sound: 8; Great sound effects from most guns. Excellent voice packs, especially for the bear.

Presentation: 6; Its pretty confusing when you first look at the menus. They could have set the ammo so that when you change the guns, it changes the ammo. That kinda makes it a bitch.

Fun: 9;...

U4eT

item.title: A serious rant.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
This thread is full of nothingness with no relation to the section topic whatsoever. But now, I actually have a rant, and I really just need to vent.

I am just plain sick of the federal goverment impeding on gamers right. All I want to do is play my video games, and just because you believe that a reason for a teenage murder is based on games like GTA, you think it needs to be banned. You just do not have the proper intelligence to be in such a high office. This is beyond idiotic, beyond...

A serious rant.

item.title: I'm like, da cool...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
I've been gone for about 9 months or so, and my last thread here still reigns supreme.....ok, well, in 2nd place.....3rd once I post this....

Well, whazzup folks? I just came heer to chill or something. This isn't proving that I will be hanging around here more often (I don't have much use of being here). But I am getting a job soon and I could finnally get my own computer so I could get my own copy of one of those new fangled UT games so I can finnaly play mods and discuss them with BUF...

I'm like, da cool...

item.title: Exam results
item.author: invalid@example.com (Fallen Angel)
item.dc:creator: Fallen Angel
item.content:encoded:
I just got my exam results =o


alot better than I expected.





and just to let you know Intermediate 2 is a grade above what your ment to do

[left to right:- lowest to Highest]
e.g. 4th Year:- Foundation/General/Credit/Int 1
5th/6th Year:- Int 1/Int 2/Higher/Advanced Higher

I was in 4th. [Scottish school system is alot different from American/english]

item.title: Darwin
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded:
"Well ya see, Norm, it's like this. A herd of buffalo can only move as fast as the slowest buffalo. And when the herd is hunted, it is the slowest and weakest ones at the back that are killed first. This natural selection is good for the herd as a whole, because the general speed and health of the whole group keeps improving by the regular killing of the weakest members. In much the same way, the human brain can only operate as fast as the slowest brain cells. Excessive intake of alcohol, as...

Darwin

item.title: *insert classic video game music here*
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
I finnally have it.

Yes I have it.

I got it.

Its all mine.

Now I can use it.

I finnally have cable internet.

*glorified heaven-like music plays with light beams streaming from the sky to my computer with angels singing "Amen" or "Hallelujah" in the background*

....Now what?

What should I do with it? (except for big roms and music downloads)

item.title: Smokin' Art
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded: So I was drawin' these guys for a while instead of doing my homework. I was gonna post this picture of this grinning dude, but then I did this, adding the head because this guy in my German class has been bugging me about my character's lack of heads, making my other guy look pretty boring. So, yeah. Vote in the poll.
